00044 typedef std::uint16_t uchar;

00060 static Array<uchar> spacechars = {' ', '\n', '\r', '\f', '\t', '\013'};
00061 
00081 class String : public Hashable, public BoolConvertible<String> {
00082     friend bool operator==(const String lhs, const String rhs);
00083     friend bool operator<(const String lhs, const String rhs);
00084     friend String operator+(const String lhs, const String rhs);
00085     //friend String operator%(const String lhs, const String rhs);
00086     friend String operator&(const String lhs, const String(*rhs)(const String));
00087     friend String operator&(const String(*lhs)(String), const String rhs);
00088     friend String operator*(const String lhs, const std::size_t len);
00089     friend std::ostream & operator<<(std::ostream& lhs, const String rhs);
00090 
00091 public:
00099     String();
00116     String(const char * orig);
00117 
00128     String(const Array<uchar> orig);
00136     String(const std::string & orig);
00146     String(const String & orig);
00152     String(const uchar c);
00160     String(const bool b);
00161 
00171     String(const sint i);
00179     String(const suint i);
00189     String(const slong l);
00197     String(const sulong l);
00237     String(const float f);
00277     String(const double d);
00283     virtual ~String();
00284 
00291     std::size_t length() const;
00292 
00300     const uchar at(std::size_t idx) const;
00301 
00316     const char * ascii() const;
00330     const char * utf8() const;
00331 
00342     const Array<uchar> utf16() const;
00343 
00350     String toLowerCase() const;
00351 
00358     String toUpperCase() const;
00359 
00367     bool equalsIgnoreCase(const String other) const;
00368 
00374     bool endsWith(const String other) const;
00375 
00381     bool startsWith(const String other) const;
00382 
00388     bool contains(const String other) const;
00389 
00395     String trim() const;
00396 
00405     String substring(std::idx_t begin) const;
00406 
00418     String substring(std::idx_t begin, std::idx_t end) const;
00419 
00429     sidx_t indexOf(const String substr, idx_t start = 0) const;
00430 
00438     sidx_t lastIndexOf(const String substr) const;
00439 
00449     sidx_t lastIndexOf(const String substr, idx_t end) const;
00450 
00451     String copy() const;
00452     bool merge(String other) const;
00453     int hashCode() const;
00454 
00455     static String fromHex(int, bool up);
00456     static String fromOct(int, bool up);
00457     static String fromSci(float, bool up);
00458     static String fromSci(double, bool up);
00459 
00460     bool boolValue() const;
00461     sint intValue() const;
00462     suint uintValue() const;
00463     slong longValue() const;
00464     sulong ulongValue() const;
00465     float floatValue() const;
00466     double doubleValue() const;
00467 
00468     inline bool toBool() const {
00469         return *this != "";
00470     }
00471 
00472     const String & operator=(const char * orig) const;
00473     const String & operator=(const std::string & orig) const;
00474     const String & operator=(const String orig) const;
00475 
00476     const String & operator+=(const String rhs) const;
00477 
00478 
00486     operator const char *() const;
00487 
00494     operator std::string() const;
00495 
00496     private:
00497     void fromAscii(const char* ascii) const;
00498     void fromUtf8(const char* unicode) const;
00499 
00500     struct Data {
00501 
00502         Data(size_t len) : data(len), refcount(1) {
00503         }
00504 
00505         virtual ~Data() {
00506         }
00507         Array<uchar> data;
00508         mutable std::size_t refcount;
00509     };
00510     mutable Data * strdata;
00511 
00512 };
00513 
00514 bool operator==(const String lhs, const String rhs);
00515 
00516 inline bool operator==(const String lhs, const char* rhs) {
00517     return operator==(lhs, String(rhs));
00518 }
00519 
00520 inline bool operator==(const char* rhs, const String lhs) {
00521     return operator==(String(rhs), lhs);
00522 }
00523 bool operator<(const String lhs, const String rhs);
00524 String operator+(const String lhs, const String rhs);
00525 //String operator%(const String lhs, const String rhs);
00526 String operator&(const String lhs, String(*rhs)(const String));
00527 String operator&(String(*lhs)(const String), const String rhs);
00528 String operator*(const String lhs, const std::size_t len);

00531 String lc(const String rhs);
